name: Winter knitting factory
description:
My second Christmas game, based on an activity I personally love: knitting!

There never seems to be enough time to finish your knitting projects before the holidays, but in this game you can make 200 pullovers, stress free (sort of 😛), in no time!

Just press 1, 2, 3, or 4 to clear the lanes off faulty items to get to the precious pullovers 💕

Merry Christmas everyone ❤️

Submitted to the 121st Mini Jam.

Music: "O holy night",  covered by me

Fonts: Snowtop Caps by Typographer Mediengestaltung and Maple 3 Cartoon by Galdino Otten

Snow ambience: Wind arctic cold by cobratronik
